nodes.text: This individual shared a cell aboard the Imperial prison barge Purge with another inmate named Nox Xakarta. The barge, transporting a shipment of prisoners to a detention moon, encountered technical problems and was forced to scavenge parts from a nearby Star Destroyer. The team sent on the scavenging mission returned with an unknown plague which proceeded to eliminate many aboard the barge. This individual became sick during this time.
